channel.title: How do i add giveitem command in zenith source
channel.description:
how do i add giveitem command in zenith source
help been trying 4 ages will rep+ :p

item.title: How do i add giveitem command in zenith source
item.dc:creator: @TeeBark TeeBark
item.description:
@TeeBark wrote:

[quote=“hotkid8200, post:5, topic:455581”][quote] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“giveitem”)) {

try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" “);
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
String otherplayer = args[3];
Client c2 = null;
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(otherplayer)) {
c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
break;
}
}
}
if (c2 == null) {
c.sendMessage(“Player doesn’t exist.”);
return;
}
c.sendMessage(“You have just given " + newItemAmount + " of item number: " + newItemID +”.” );
c2.sendMessage(“You have just been given item(s).” );
c2.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} catch(Exception e) {
c.sendMessage(“Use as ::giveitem ID AMOUNT PLAYERNAME.”);
}
}[/quote]

That’s my code.[/quote]

:fp: Let a man use google.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add giveitem command in zenith source
item.dc:creator: @hotkid8200 hotkid8200
item.description:
@hotkid8200 wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("giveitem")) {

try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" “);
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
String otherplayer = args[3];
Client c2 = null;
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(otherplayer)) {
c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
break;
}
}
}
if (c2 == null) {
c.sendMessage(“Player doesn’t exist.”);
return;
}
c.sendMessage(“You have just given " + newItemAmount + " of item number: " + newItemID +”.” );
c2.sendMessage(“You have just been given item(s).” );
c2.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} catch(Exception e) {
c.sendMessage(“Use as ::giveitem ID AMOUNT PLAYERNAME.”);
}
}

That’s my code.
